alert.note: Alert for Baraga; Iron (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 1:28PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Iron and southeastern Baraga Counties through 200 PM EDT/100 PM CDT/... At 128 PM EDT/1228 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Covington to near U.S. 141 between Covington and Amasa. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Amasa around 1240 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Three Lakes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
